Title: Introducing the new DST GS-series compact gas sensors: Built for extreme conditions
Summary: The new DST GS gas sensors by Danfoss Sensing Solutions feature the company’s patented top-down inverted design in a slim, compact design with an IP66 rating, offering extra protection in extreme conditions.

Title: Danfoss motion portfolio: Now with VLT® Multiaxis Servo Drive 520
Summary: VLT® Multiaxis Servo Drive 520 is the newest addition to the Danfoss VLT® FlexMotion™ servo portfolio. This innovative servo solution delivers advanced functional safety, efficiency, and seamless integration, addressing the complex demands of modern motion control applications.

Title: Danfoss MP1T axial piston tandem pump boosts efficiency of dual-path propel systems in off-highway machinery
Summary: An addition to the popular MP1 medium-power closed-circuit hydraulic platform, the Danfoss MP1T tandem pump offers high rotating efficiency, enhanced controllability, and the shortest pump length in its class. The pump is designed for construction machinery and other applications with dual-path propel systems.

Title: Introducing Danfoss hygienic gasketed plate heat exchangers:  Elevating hygienic processing standards
Summary: Introducing Danfoss Hygienic Gasketed Plate Heat Exchangers – Elevate your hygienic processing standards with our innovative solutions designed for the food and beverage industry. Our heat exchangers are engineered with FDA-compliant materials to ensure the highest quality and meet stringent hygienic requirements. Experience exceptional performance in applications like dairy pasteurization, beverage cooling, and brewery heating. With modular frames for adaptability, frame extenders for optimized space, and versatile brackets for easy installation, streamline your operations and minimize downtime. Discover tailored solutions that enhance flexibility and efficiency. Learn more about our groundbreaking features and visit our product page for detailed information.

Title: Danfoss XL104 controller achieves ISOBUS certification, delivering reliable interoperability for agricultural equipment
Summary: The Danfoss DM-Qt display series supports Qt as a plug-in to PLUS+1® GUIDE, where user interface (UI) design can now be developed through the Qt framework — the new standard for creating embedded display UIs in the automobile industry.

Title: Danfoss strengthens Benelux distribution with sale to heat exchangers experts
Summary: Danfoss Plate Heat Exchangers is pleased to announce the sale of SONDEX B.V., based in Purmerend in the Netherlands, to heat exchanger experts Theo Thoen and Hans Ter Velde.

Title: Beijer Ref and Danfoss Climate Solutions sign strategic agreement in Nordborg
Summary: Monday this week marked a key milestone in our collaboration with Beijer Ref, as Danfoss Climate Solutions officially extended our partnership agreement through the end of 2027.
